designation: Assistant Professor, School of Computer Science and Engineering
biography: Dr. Tianwei Zhang received his Bachelor’s degree in physics at Peking University, in 2011, and the Ph.D degree in Electrical Engineering at Princeton University in 2017. He worked at Amazon as a software engineer from 2017 to 2019. He joined Nanyang Technological University as an assistant professor in 2019. He has published papers in top-tier architecture and security conferences and journals. He has served on the Program Committee of many conferences, and reviewers of journals.
